def minimum_team_difference(a, b, c, d):
    total_sum = a + b + c - d
    tuyoi = max(a, b, c, d) + min(a, b, c, d)
    min_difference = abs(total_sum - 2 * tuyoi)
    return min_difference

def minimum_team_difference(a, b, c, d):
    total_sum = (a + b + c) * d
    tuyoi = max(a, b, c, d) + min(a, b, c, d)
    min_difference = abs(total_sum - 2 * tuyoi)
    return min_difference
